mapper.select: select * from kms_attend_class as ac inner join kms_classModel as cm on ac.classModel_id = cm.id inner join kms_classroom as cr on ac.classroom_id = cr.id inner join kms_user as us on ac.user_id = us.id where ac.classModel_id=#{classModeId}
mapper.sql: id, classroom_id, classModel_id, user_id, `hours`, expla_in, time_class
mapper.insert:
insert into kms_attend_class
classroom_id,
classModel_id,
user_id,
`hours`,
expla_in,
time_class,
#{classroomId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{classmodelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{hours,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{explaIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{timeClass,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update kms_attend_class
classroom_id = #{classroomId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
classModel_id = #{classmodelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`hours` = #{hours,jdbcType=BIGINT},
expla_in = #{explaIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
time_class = #{timeClass,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update kms_attend_class set classroom_id = #{classroomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, classModel_id = #{classmodelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `hours` = #{hours,jdbcType=BIGINT}, expla_in = #{explaIn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_class = #{timeClass,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
